analysis.description: stage in Crowdsale.getCurrentBonus (/unique_chucks/3/0xfbe878ced08132bd8396988671b450793c44bc12.sol#529) is a local variable never initialiazed

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0xfbe878ced08132bd8396988671b450793c44bc12.sol#461-474) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_addr,toMint) (/unique_chucks/3/0xfbe878ced08132bd8396988671b450793c44bc12.sol#473)

	-token.mint(_to,_toMint) (/unique_chucks/3/0xfbe878ced08132bd8396988671b450793c44bc12.sol#482-486)

Crowdsale.airDrop (/unique_chucks/3/0xfbe878ced08132bd8396988671b450793c44bc12.sol#489-499) does not use the value returned by external calls:
